name: Picnic Party
description:
Picnic Party is a spelling and typing game developed to help people of all ages to gain valuable spelling and typing skills. This cute little mini game captures the audience with a cute little bear who’s at a picnic. Incoming bees want to steal his honey, but to avoid this happening you need to type the word above the bee before it reaches you. You’ll earn one point for each bee you successfully manage to shoo away. You’ve got a certain amount of honey you need to protect, and if you lose it all it’s game over, oh oh! Better get typing!

Created together with LittleRoo and hideandsketch.
